Articles.Content:
A while ago I started making mission patches for my KSP missions, and I decided to start one for every planet. Here are some of the logos I've made!

![ybEcqLr.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/ybEcqLr.png?1)

![9YcvBgh.png?2](http://i.imgur.com/9YcvBgh.png?2)

![qWlwy2p.png?2](http://i.imgur.com/qWlwy2p.png?2)

WIP Eve and Jool patches:

![bPalCLJ.png](http://i.imgur.com/bPalCLJ.png)

![wnvh63K.png](http://i.imgur.com/wnvh63K.png)

> 
> Looks great!

Thanks! I can't decide whether I like the minimalistic horizon style, or the more cartoony one. Which do you think is best?

> 
> Thanks! I can't decide whether I like the minimalistic horizon style, or the more cartoony one. Which do you think is best?

I think they both look great, but if I had to choose, I'd say the more cartoony one.

What image editor are you using?

> 
> What image editor are you using?

Believe it or not, Pages in Mac OSX.
